duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and overseeing Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers.
Utilize science expertise in item development and scoring process, and provide expertise and training on Math assessments.
Communicate with various stakeholders via chat, email, phone, reports, video meetings, and in-person interactions.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, as well as provide live or pre-recorded training on Science and Math items.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences; additional Math college courses preferred.
